name: Guinea Pig Tamagotchi
description:
hey there!  👋

i made this little game for my partner who was homesick for her guinea pig. i recently re-made it for her and people asked me to upload it here so they can play it as well.

this version will only work if you open this page on the same computer! (every computer has it's own guinea pig)

CONTROLS:
* click on feeder and/or water bottle to fill
* right click to give treats
* drag over the guinea pig to pet it

be sure to come back often to feed it, otherwise it get's sad!

please consider sharing this game among your friends and/or following me on mastodon or twitter.
